title: Implementation Consultant (PLSQL / Java)
tagsAndSkills: PLSQL,Oracle,Java,Consulting

placeholders.label: Hybrid - Navi Mumbai, Thane, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
About The Role


The role does not require pure code development as the software package requires configuration using the provided tool set, but there are aspects of the implementation activities that benefit greatly for some core development capabilities and principles. The role requires a desire and the analytical mindset to understand the data that drives business process and how to manage the quality of that data. Candidates will be part of the Professional Services team and work as an Implementation Specialist


Who is an Implementation Specialist?


When a client purchases a new hardware or software system from us, the sales representative who sold it to them moves on to the next client. Thats where an Implementation Specialist comes in. Implementation Specialists use their technical knowledge to install, monitor and customize systems for our clients after the initial purchase has already taken place.

To accomplish this, you will talk with our clients, customize features, define objectives and deliver training sessions. Essentially, you ensure that a client doesn't just buy our product, but has a positive experience with it, too.


You will typically report to higher-level member of staff, such as an project Manager or Implementation Manager, while working with a small team of other Implementation Specialists. Although you will spend most of your time in an office environment, you may also need to travel in order to meet with clients.


Industry Experience


GoldenSource is looking to augment its Professional Services team with someone having specific industry experience within the IT arena having previously worked with on projects in Data management space for asset types like Equities, Bonds, FX, Futures, Forwards, Options, Swaps, Volatilities, Credit Curves, and Commodities with client facing exposure.


Domain experience in Asset management, Custody, Hedge fund, Pension Fund, Risk would be preferred.


Key Deliverables


1. Produces detailed low-level designs from high level design specifications for components of low-level complexity.

2. Develops, builds and unit tests components from detailed low-level designs.

3. Carries out unit testing on own developed code, developing test harnesses if necessary.

4. Applies all relevant standards and procedures to own work

5. Accurately records own time and accurately reports progress on own work.

6. Complies with all confidentiality and non-disclosure policies and/or agreements and ensures security of information at all times.


Required Skill sets


1. Good in Object Oriented Programming concepts and data structures.

2. Core JAVA and or RDBMS

3. UNIX/LINUX usage – scripting knowledge would be an added advantage.


Desirable skills


1. Strong understanding  of J2EE  concepts and experience of either JBOSS or Weblogic including clustering and tuning

2. Queuing technologies including Kafka, MQ, Solace

3. Scripting including Python, Unix, java

4. Hands on knowledge of Dev ops processes and tools, including test automation
